Bin numeric vector into breaks using classInt::classIntervals

Source: R/utils.R
add_breaks.Rd

Works with dplyr::mutate to add a column of breaks. Breaks labels are formatted with scales::label_number_si

add_breaks(x, n = 5, style = "jenks", lab_accuracy = 1, replace_Inf = TRUE)

Arguments

x

numeric vector
n

number of bins
style

of class intervals. see classInt::classIntervals for details
lab_accuracy

accuracy of labels, passed to scales::label_number_si
replace_Inf

if Inf is your final break, replace with a + sign in the label?
